alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:10AM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wind chill values as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to noon Sunday: Fredonia 4 to 6 inches Jacob Lake 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
